name: 蒼葉
message: "You sure this way's faster?"

name: 蓮
message: "Yes."
I make my way down Aoyagi Street, Ren navigating.
As I walk alone, I notice a familiar tag all over the walls of an alley.
Beni-Shigure, the Crimson Rain. Koujaku's gang.
These tags are how Rib gangs stake their claims. This is part of Koujaku's territory.
Koujaku's gang isn't that big. Not that many people know that Koujaku is a Ribsteez in the first place.

Thanks to Koujaku's popularity with women, he's often wound up in brawls with jealous men.

But he's never lost. Over time, his strength earned him some male fans as well, and this became his gang.
I think the way he looks after them shows the kind of guy Koujaku is. He's not one to turn away people who look up to him.

Many Ribsteez join gangs because they admire the leader.

Such members often take after their idol, which is why you see so many men wearing kimonos in Beni-Shigure territory.
They might look like bad news at first glance, but they're all good people. They help old ladies carry their bags and lost children find their parents.
That's why Beni-Shigure is pretty popular in the Old Residential District. Koujaku is to thank for that too... probably.

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Yo, Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "'Sup."
I exchange greetings with a couple Beni-Shigure members who are chatting with a police officer.
The police in the Old Residential District are corrupt, but some will mingle with the regular folk if they're in the right mood―or there's money involved.
Some Ribsteez take such opportunities to fish for useful information or get a pass on some misdemeanor.
Whatever works for them, I say.
As I make my way farther down the street, I hear some excited voices coming from up ahead.
It's a man and two women, walking arm-in-arm.

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Oh, you're terrible!"

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "But that's why we love you!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Hahaha!"
I knew it. It's Koujaku.
I really don't want to see him right now, with his fans around... but it's already too late to escape.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey, Aoba!"
I try to keep the grimace off my face.

name: ベニ
message: "Aoba! How's Ren?"

Koujaku's Allmate, Beni, is flying next to him.
Ren pops his head out of my bag.

name: 蓮
message: "I'm right here."

name: ベニ
message: "Oh, hey."

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Is he a friend of yours, Koujaku?"
The women look at me, sizing me up.

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah, we go way back."

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Oh? Really?"
Well, sorry that the amazing Koujaku's friend doesn't measure up.
Though I've known the guy since I was little, it's not like we spent our whole childhood together.
Koujaku is originally from the mainland. He came to the island with his mother, then went back to the mainland a few years later.
We lost touch after that for a while, until suddenly, about three years ago, Koujaku came back―this time by himself.
He'd grown a lot, but the way he talked and smiled were still the same old Koujaku.
We started hanging out again after that. Koujaku often stops by my place to get a taste of Granny's cooking.

name: 紅雀
message: "What's the matter with you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: 紅雀
message: "You don't look so hot."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'm fine."

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah? If you say so."
I try to play it cool, but I'm actually surprised. Do I really look that sick?

name: 紅雀
message: "You working?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "We can't all live like you."
The women react to my jab before Koujaku can.

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Hey! It's not like he's fooling around, you know!"

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Yeah! He's just walking us home on his way to work."

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey, now. He's not wrong. How can I work with such lovely ladies at my side?"

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Kya!"

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Oh, Koujaku!"
I'll never understand how he spouts crap like that.

name: ベニ
message: "A man must never refuse a woman's affections."

name: 紅雀
message: "Exactly. Women are a treasure. They're soft and gentle, and warm men with their embrace. That's why we have to protect them. Right?"
Koujaku puts his arms around the women's shoulders.

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Kyaaaaa!!!"

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "I could just die!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I should get going."

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Oh? Wait a second!"
Before I can leave, one of the women stops me.

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Here, look. You've got something on you."
The woman reaches out with her slender fingers and brushes something off my collar.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh... Thanks."

name: 紅雀
message: "I do love a woman with a keen eye."

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Hehehe. ...Huh?"
The woman suddenly looks at me like she noticed something.

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Wow, your hair's pretty long."

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Oh, you're right!"

name: ファンの女子Ｂ
message: "Hehe, it's kinda cute."

name: ファンの女子Ａ
message: "Just like a girl!"
Giggling, one of the women reaches for my hair.
